attributes.action: Build our children a SAFE Liberton High School.
attributes.additional_details:
Our children deserve to be taught in a safe environment.
Due to the recent death of Keane Wallis-Bennett, and the severe injury of another pupil in an incident last year, this is quite apparently not the case!
We the parents of the current and future children attending Liberton High, demand action to prevent this avoidable tragedy from happening again!
Demolish the monstrousity and build the children a school they deserve, and one that their parents have paid for through the obscene amount of tax they pay.
